dialogue.text: You're talking to me? Does that mean you're ready for a match?
What am I up against?
No one likes it when a newcomer gets into the arena and dies right off, so you're only up against a bear to start with.
I have to kill a bear?
Oh, is that all?
Yeah, it should be pretty simple. Just don't get mauled and you should be fine.
Must I go alone?
Later on you might go in with someone else, but for now, you'll be fine on your own.
What do I get if I win?
To live.
Anything else?
If you win a lot, the crowd may start to like you.
Just set me up with a match.
You're the boss...No wait, I am. Hah.
Give me some more time.
Hurry it up.
What do you do?
Do you train?
Goodbye.
You're not going to say anything?
Why not?
I see...
See? You did fine. This time might not be so easy though. Are you ready for the next match?
What do I have to beat this time?
Pixies. Nasty little creatures. Come in groups and are poisonous to the touch.
Do I still have to go it alone?
No, this time that kid Bernard will go in with you. You’re lucky.
Just set me up with the match.
Yeah, yeah.
Give me some more time.
Whatever.
Are you interested in studying the arcane arts?
Why should I study magic?
You mean besides the pursuit of knowledge and learning is not enough of a reward?
I mean, can it help with my current situation?
Just like everyone else in this hellish place. Well, magic is powerful. You will probably have to see for yourself in the arena though.
I was hoping for something a little more pragmatic.
Nope. I just want to blow something up.
Let's see what you can teach me.
Open your mind and let go of your preconceptions.
Goodbye.
If you ever change your mind you know where to find me.
Impressive, you got some of the nobles to bet quite a lot on your match. You ready for another?
How much did I make the arena?
What do I have to beat this time?
Do you know what a Rellian Bloodletter is?
No.
A lot. No one thought you would actually win.
Yes.
Right, well. Good luck, then. (He laughs.)
(He only laughs.)
Do I have to go it alone?
You and Bernard are a current crowd favorite, so you’ll go in together. Can’t say you will be for long though.
What do you mean?
The dead aren't favorites.
Just set me up with the match.
Hah hah, I’m going to be placing my own bets on this one.
Give me some more time.
As if preparing more is going to help.
What you want?
What are you doing here?
I make sure that you don't die.
How do you do that?
Does it work?
I tell you what to do, you do it, and things go better.
If they do what I say. But they never do.
Show me what you can teach me.
Just do what I say and you'll be fine.
I'll have to come back later.
Fine, but don't blame me when things go wrong.
(He says nothing, instead pounding his fist into his hand.)
Is everything okay?
And then what? You'll just keep on winning forever?
Yeah, yeah. Just keep winning.
What's your problem?
(He just stares at you.)
(Stare back.)

dialogue.prerequisites: "Having discussed this plan with the warrior trainer"
dialogue.text: (Stare back.)
(He roars and attacks you.)
Gonna win, gonna keep winning, can't stop winning.
I'll... come back later.
(He doesn't respond.)
It's been much too long since I've begun in here.

dialogue.prerequisites: "has not gotten the health potion yet."
dialogue.text: How long have you been at it?
How have you done it?
I don't know if I could tell you that.
You can trust me with your secret.
Oh no, no. Can't risk being found out.
I've devised a way to create health potions from some of the natural materials down here.
I don't know. Months.
Feel like sharing?
Give me one or I'll let your secret out of the bag.
I... suppose I can spare one for your silence.
Goodbye.
Goodbye.
Good luck out there.
Come! Look at my wares!
Who are you?
Who are you?
Okay, let's see what you have for sell.
Of course, of course! Right this way.
Maybe later.
Of course, if ever you need anything, you just come back to see me.
Why are you selling right outside this person's shop?
Selling my wares, of course. The proprieter here doesn't mind me much.
What can I help you with?
Who are you?
I'm Cabal. Lived here all my life.
That guy is still there? He sells way too high and sells right outside. I don't get it.
Sure thing.
Why is there that merchant out there?
That guy is still there? He sells way too high and sells right outside. I don't get it.
That guy is still there? He sells way too high and sells right outside. I don't get it.
Does he bother you?
Anyone who buys from him is an idiot and probably deserves it.
What? No. Annoying bugger, but not really threatening.
Do you want me to take care of him?
I can't believe we made it!
Of course we made it.
What do you mean, of course we made it? No one's ever done that before!
We had to. I'm not going to give up my life just because someone tells us that it's useless.
*player*... You're right. We can't just give up because we don't like the way things are.
But, what do we do now?
We can't give up just because things seem bleak.
Just barely. This place is insane.
It's always been that way. Life is hard and unfair.
Why don't you do something about it?
What can we do about it, *name*. It's too hard to fight against the entire empire.
There has got to be something that we can do.
Maybe we could make something of a difference to someone. Everyone matters.
Maybe you are right, *name*.
What do you mean?
You know, I've seen you fight. You're really something. It's really too bad that you're going to... Well, you know.
What more can you teach me?
Let me show you some things.
I'll come back later.
Alright.
Is there anything you can think of to get me out of here?
It's been years since someone's even been rumored to escape.
Aren't you magic or something?
So? There must be a way.
Magic is totally useless then.
Well... There may be a way. I think I know a spell, but it requires a specific ingrediant.
Why, I never!
What is it?
A gloom mushroom. It can be found growing around the arena sometimes. Take a look around.
Okay, I'll be back when I have one.
Good luck.
Anything else I should know?
What are you going to try to do?
I'm going to try a spell that hasn't been tried in years.
It will take some magic skill on your part. I hope you are up for the task.
Do you have the mushroom yet?
Yes.
No.
Come back when you do.
Can you train me in the mean time?
Of course.
Great. Now, I'm going to try to cast a teleportation spell.
Is that dangerous?
What do I have to do?
There's been stories of landing halfway through a wall or only half of a person getting teleported.
Great. So what do I do?
Use what magic skill you have to help me with this ritual and we'll see if we can make it happen.
(Help with the ritual.)
(Help with the ritual.)
No, no, no, no! That's all wrong. Look, if you're going to want this to work you're going to need to brush up on your magic skills.
(Help with the ritual.)
There, there! It's working! Goodbye!
Impressive fighting out there, eh?
Could you just show me some techniques?
For you. Yeah.
I'll come back later.
Yeah, yeah, whenever you want.
Except I really shouldn't be here.
But now I'm going to have to go up against stronger monsters.
I know. You know, there've been rumors of people escaping before.
Really? How did they do it?
Well. There've been disappearances in my day. Maybe so.
How'd they do it?
Well, what do you think they did?
Rumor goes that someone tunneled out through the confinement cell.
You're saying I'd have to break into jail?
How do I get in?
If you get into a fight with another combatant they'll throw you in.
With whom do you suggest I do that?
Do you think they're true?
One of the combatants is a bit on edge. Gone crazy. If you tell him off right, he might go off on you. Then you could look into escaping.
Okay, I'll look into it, thanks.
Good luck.
